text: You'll have to make an app. The timeline api only allows Oauth

It won't be a sharable app as long if you don't publish it. You'll have to create one, set up a callback on a site, and use the Oauth flow. It's not the easiest to set up, but once you've done it, you know the ways :smile:

Ok, found it, it's a typo
You should use since= not Since=

Hi Everyone! I have an API question about Line Items. I see in the docs that we can create, update and remove line items. Does anyone know if this includes line items that are attached to deals that are closed / won?

Hello! I'm looking at the Associations documentation and it seems like you can only get the associations of one object at a time. Has anyone figured out a workaround to, say, get all of your companies and their associated customers?
